features: 2024 Upgraded Portable Charger: After continual testing, ME08 portable charger come to reality. Provides exceptional battery life with upgrade magnetism for iphone, apple watch and Airpods. Such a power bank adopts high-end intelligent controlling IC, safer, more dependable, and longer battery life for travel and outdoors. Truly a wireless charger.

Compatibility: ME08 Portable Charger share a wide compatibility: Supports wireless charging for iphone 12/13/14/15, apple watch SE/2/3/4/5/6/7/8, Airpods 2/ Airpods 3rd Gen/Airpods Pro/Airpods Pro 2nd Gen ONLY. Just snap-and-go! Wired charging can be used to most Android devices.

LED Indicator&Multi-protection: LED indicators will tell the remaining power, each indicator standing for 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100% specifically. Owing to its multi-protect safety system, it will effectively prevents further damage from overcharge, over-voltage, over-current, and short circuit to the battery when charging.

Super Magnetism: Supports QC4.0+PD10W super fast charge like Mag-safe accessories, allowing you to charge iphone as if it were not there. More convenient and less concern over the low battery. Embrace technical facilities to keep your iphone juice up all day!

Travel-Friendly: kurdene ME08 Power Bank features an ultra-slim and lightweight design, embedded with a high-quality Li-polymer electric core. A length of 3.98*2.63*0.5 inch and weighs just 125g. Really Portable, definitely a MUST for traveling for its compact shape. Wherever you go, charge on the go!

Added Value: kurdene ME08 Wireless Power Bank (5000mAh), USB Cable (Lightning cord is NOT included), User Manual. We stand behind our product and offer a satisfactory warranty and after-sale service to every customer. Any questions or suggestions, please contact us. We'll do our best to resolve the issue.

Our power bank is Not compatible with non-magsafe/non-magnetic phone case. Other phones/devices that support wireless charging can be charged wirelessly, but have no magnetic function. We recommend charging with a MagSafe phone case or without cases to get enough suction.

NOTE: Please press the button to activate Power Bank before using the magnetic charging function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are Great!
reviews.reviewText: I never write reviews but these earbuds are so awesome. I'm not sure why there are bad reviews but I have had mine for about a month and just bought my son a pair and the best thing about them is the battery life. I work 12 hr shifts, sometimes 16 hrs and keep one in my ear all day, and the charge will last a couple of days before I have to recharge them. The sound is great, I love the colors, and I have no issues keeping them in my ears all day long. I've never been able to do that bc they've always hurt my ears after awhile. These are comfortable and don't hurt at all. Love these and the price is amazing. I will continue to buy these as needed & will update if I have any issues. Buy these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They survived being washed (in the washer) twice
reviews.reviewText: They are very good earbuds sound quality is great but don't wear them to the beach pool or gym they don't stay in the ear well but they are water proof i lost them in my sheets and they got washed twice but they still work amazing and ive had them for just onder 2years

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sound but EXTREMELY sensitive!
reviews.reviewText: I don't write a lot of product reviews. It's easy to use the left, right, or both. I usually listen using a single. These paired easily and the sound quality was good. Unfortunately, the left earbud is now significantly quieter than the right. I've tried everything to reset, make sure there is nothing blocking, etc.. My main frustration with these is that they are extremely sensitive. When I'm in the pool or the shower they are constantly toggling play/pause and volume up and down. I do like them, but it is a significant source of frustration if anything even remotely comes near them (hat, hair, water drops...anything).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved the compact size light weight and really cool

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’ve bought more!
reviews.reviewText: I had two and was out on a group outing. Someone asked if I had a charger and I handed them it. She was obsessed. So much that she bought one herself. My husband even asked for one too. It’s great compact and slim. Easy for travel and to take anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I got a dud pair
reviews.reviewText: I liked them, sound is good, and they fit my small ears.... but mine wont charge, the little light in the box just continues to flash amber, so you cant even tell if they are charging, there is just no way to know if the box is charged or charging.. I wish the indicator light in the box was more explanatory. there is no info on why it would flash amber. you would think that would mean its low, and to put on the charger... so I did, but, they just continue to flash amber...so I do not believe its seeing its on the charger.. I mean the website has NO support. You cant even contact them. The website shows the little light blue.. so apparently it can change colors... Just dont waste your money.. no way these are worth $30 bucks as listed on their website.. i paid $20 just to get the green ones, but no.... no way these are worth more then $12 tops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality for good price
reviews.reviewText: Love these . I use them every day at work and charge them overnight. Used them on vacation on my plane too. Love them. They fit well and come with different size rubber things for ears. Love the color. Sound is great to me and it blocks out sound around you pretty decently too. Def happy with this purchase. Easy to connect Bluetooth too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t fully recharge phone
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t charge fully like it claims and turns off when in middle of a recharge
